title: Unmissable Visit To Paracas, Huacachina And Sunset In The Oasis
description: Unforgettable full-day trip from Lima to Paracas and Ica. Cruise around the Ballestas Islands and spot sea lions, penguins, and exotic birds in their natural habitat. Then, enjoy a wine and pisco tasting at the Culturpisco vineyard, followed by an adrenaline-filled adventure in the Huacachina desert with a thrilling dune buggy ride and sandboarding across towering sand dunes.
all_descriptions: Unforgettable full-day trip from Lima to Paracas and Ica. Cruise around the Ballestas Islands and spot sea lions, penguins, and exotic birds in their natural habitat. Then, enjoy a wine and pisco tasting at the Culturpisco vineyard, followed by an adrenaline-filled adventure in the Huacachina desert with a thrilling dune buggy ride and sandboarding across towering sand dunes.

ItineraryThis is a typical itinerary for this productStop At:Lima, Lima, Lima Region04:00 a.m. ‚Äì Pick-up from hotels in San Isidro, Miraflores, and Barranco

We begin our adventure by picking up each traveler from their hotel or Airbnb at 4:00 a.m., according to our included pick-up zones. (The exact pick-up time will be confirmed one day prior, based on the location of your accommodation).Duration: 1 hourStop At:Paracas, Paracas, Ica Region08:00 a.m. ‚Äì Lima to Paracas (approximately 3 hours of travel)

Arrival at the Port of Paracas at 8:00 a.m. We‚Äôll have between 30 to 40 minutes to enjoy breakfast and use the restroom facilities. (Breakfast is not included in the tour price).

09:15 a.m. ‚Äì Registration at El Chaco Port (approximately 20 minutes)

At 9:00 a.m., we‚Äôll begin lining up to board our modern boats.
Due to port logistics, there may be a wait time of 10 to 20 minutes before boarding.
We recommend bringing sunscreen, a hat or cap for the sun, and a waterproof jacket.Duration: 3 hoursStop At:Islas Ballestas, Paracas 11660 Peru09:30 a.m. ‚Äì Ballestas Islands (approximate duration: 1 hour and 30 minutes)

The Ballestas Islands are a group of islands located off the coast of Peru, known for their impressive marine life and exotic birds.

Discover the natural beauty of the Ballestas Islands ‚Äî a true marine paradise along the Peruvian coast. Explore waters teeming with marine wildlife, observe exotic birds in their natural habitat, and immerse yourself in the rich biodiversity of the ocean.

A unique experience for nature and adventure lovers!Duration: 1 hourStop At:Culturpisco, Los Arrabales, Ica 11004, Peru2:00 p.m. ‚Äì Culturpisco Winery

Culturpisco is a renowned winery located in the Ica region of Peru, famous for producing pisco, Peru‚Äôs iconic grape-based spirit.

During the visit, travelers will have the opportunity to taste a variety of pisco products and learn about the entire production process, from grape harvesting to distillation.Duration: 1 minuteStop At:Huacachina, Huacachina, Ica Region3:30 p.m. ‚Äì Arrival at the Huacachina Oasis ‚Äì Free time

We‚Äôll arrive at the Huacachina Oasis, where you‚Äôll have approximately 40 minutes of free time to explore and enjoy this beautiful location. Huacachina is an iconic spot in the Ica desert, known for its picturesque lagoon surrounded by towering sand dunes.

4:30 p.m. ‚Äì Huacachina Oasis: Buggies and Sandboarding (approximate duration: 2 hours)

To end this adventure on a high note, we‚Äôll visit the famous Huacachina Oasis, located just 5 km from downtown Ica. In this stunning location, visitors can enjoy the peaceful atmosphere, walk around the lagoon for scenic photos, and engage in adventure sports like buggy rides and sandboarding. (The combined duration of both activities is approximately 1 hour.)Duration: 6 hoursStop At:Lima, Lima, Lima Region6:30 p.m. ‚Äì Ica to Lima

Finally, we depart from Ica back to the city of Lima. Arrival is scheduled between 10:30 p.m. and 11:00 p.m.

Important:
If you are planning to stay in Huacachina after the excursion, please keep in mind that our tours are conducted in small groups, and transportation is exclusively reserved for our passengers.

Due to the limited capacity of the vehicle, only one backpack or small suitcase of up to 10 kg per person is allowed on the bus.

However, we understand that some travelers may need to bring additional luggage, especially if they plan to extend their stay in the area. For this reason, we offer the option to add one large suitcase for an additional cost of $30 per unit. This allows you to travel more comfortably with everything you need to enjoy your stay in Huacachina.Duration: 4 hours

ibis Lima Larco Miraflores, Av. Jos√© Larco 1140, Miraflores 15074, PeruThe meeting point is outside the Hotel Ibis Larco Miraflores. The time is confirmed a day earlier. Be punctual, the tolerance is 5 minutes. We also offer pick-up from your hotel for an additional cost.
End:This activity ends back at the meeting point.

SIT ON THE LEFT ON THE BOAT

Sep 2025 ‚Ä¢ Solo
Awesome experience! The only thing is try to be on the left side of the boat as 90% of the time, thats where there was something to see. I did read other reviews that said that their boat driver we‚Äôre making sure both sides would see the attraction but it was unfortunately not the case for us. The dune buggy was awesome. I definitely recommend to rush to the buggys to be in the front seat!

Bus was clean and comfortable and we we‚Äôre able to leave our bags inside when doing activities.

Sep 2025 ‚Ä¢ Family
The tour was amazing, it was my first trip alone with my daughter and it really was a wonderful experience that we will always remember. Everything was very well organized, with a varied and entertaining route that allowed us to enjoy every moment.

Our guide, Maria Ochoa was simply exceptional: attentive, close and always willing to help us. He took care of every detail and shared very interesting information that greatly enriched the experience.

I definitely recommend taking the tour with them; dedication, professionalism and warmth are noticeable every step of the way. An experience really worth living.
I recommend: take warm clothes to Islas Ballestas as it is windy and light clothes to Huacachina because it is very hot.

A loving greeting from Chile üá®üá±

reviews.title: 5-start tour
reviews.text: Oh, this is a 5-star tour! Oswaldo is simply the best‚Äîgive him a promotion üòÖ. I felt like a VIP with his service. He‚Äôs very attentive and you can tell he truly loves history; he explained the tour so well. He even brought little details like tissue papers, candies, hand sanitizer, and wipes in his backpack. He gave us great tips about the bandanas and the fair prices at the market so we wouldn‚Äôt get scammed. He has the best energy to keep you going through such a long day. Extra points for his music box!The breakfast stop was delicious and warm. It‚Äôs a long day, but at night they even made a stop for bathroom and snacks. Everything was very well organized‚Äîpeople were waiting for us at each spot, and by the end of the night he drops you right back at your pickup location.

reviews.title: Great trip. Couldn't understand the guide.
reviews.text: Great trip. Ballestas islands not possible so went to other islands instead. Lovely boat and saw lots of wildlife. Pisco tasting was very good. Highlight was the sand buggy tour which  was absolutely fantastic. Amazing landscape and incredible drivers. Awesome experience!Unfortunately we could not understand our tour guide Joal. He spoke Spanish and very good English but spoke so quickly and constantly switched between languages so was totally incomprehensible. Not helped by using a poor microphone. But also gave tons of information...but in a monotone all in one go instead of relevant info as we travelled along ..so don't think anyone on the bus, Spanish or English understood anything. Otherwise a great tour.

reviews.title: Superb Tour
reviews.text: The tour was super nice and economical , we were able to do many things in one tour . A great experience . Dune buggy and sand boarding was a great experience . Also Joal was awesome in the process

reviews.title: Wonderful and super pleased with this tour
reviews.text: Thank you for giving me such a wonderful experience üíúüôåüèªüôèüèªüî• the super-retail guide, the super responsible driver behind the wheel. Very good logistics. The best part of the whole day was the closure in the sands where I could have an adrenaline spike üî•üî•üî•üî• laughing and feeling like a child üíúüíúüíúüíúüíúüíúüíú

reviews.title: Thrilling dune buggy and sandboarding trip with excellent views of marine life.
reviews.text: We had an excellent time . The boat ride was amazing and we were able to see all the listed animals. The boat operator was able to get us very close which was awesome .  The wine tour was fun and the guides there have a good time getting the guests to participate. The dune buggy ride was thrilling. Great time sandboarding too. Our guide was very knowledgeable and friendly. The only drawback was it was difficult to understand what he was saying as he has his mouth too close to the microphone. Our only complaint would be that we were left waiting to hear what time the tour bus was going to pick us up. They initially said we would be notified in the late afternoon. This turned into almost 8pm. We wanted to go to bed early to get good rest so that was inconvenient.

reviews.title: Don't miss the dunes
reviews.text: A very good tour, my favorite part was the dunes in Huacachina, an unforgettable experience watching the sunset. Jordan's always very vigilant about the group.
